name: linkedin-profile-scraper
title: LinkedIn Profile Scraper
description: Scrape LinkedIn profiles from Google search results based on profession and country criteria. Finds public LinkedIn profile URLs without accessing private data.

input.title: LinkedIn Profile Scraper Configuration
input.description: Configure the parameters for scraping LinkedIn profiles from Google search results

profession.title: Profession/Job Title
profession.description: The profession or job title to search for (e.g., 'software engineer', 'marketing manager', 'data scientist')

country.title: Country
country.description: The country to search for profiles in (e.g., 'United States', 'Canada', 'United Kingdom')

maxPages.title: Maximum Search Pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of Google search result pages to crawl (each page contains ~10 results)

delayMs.title: Delay Between Requests (ms)
delayMs.description: Delay in milliseconds between each page request to avoid being blocked by Google

useApifyProxy.title: Use Apify Proxy
useApifyProxy.description: Use Apify's proxy service for better success rates and to avoid IP blocking

proxyGroups.title: Proxy Groups
proxyGroups.description: Which Apify proxy groups to use. RESIDENTIAL is recommended for better success with Google

dataset.title: LinkedIn Profiles
dataset.description: Dataset containing found LinkedIn profile URLs with metadata

seoTitle: LinkedIn Profile Scraper - Find Professional Profiles by Job Title and Location
seoDescription: Efficiently scrape LinkedIn profile URLs from Google search results. Search by profession and country to build targeted lead lists for business development.
shortDescription: Find LinkedIn profiles by profession and country using Google search results
